content: Great game hours of fun well worth the money. I only regret not getting it on PC instead.
I have to say my friend that you've created a masterpiece here! I'm loving 2d Skyrim in my pocket!
I love this! Old time RPG. Ahh good old fashioned rats
Simply wonderful, 85hours my first run. My second was over 100 hours, as I took a back seat to really appreciate this lovely rpg. Thank you Developer.
Great game. I have the prequals, and this one is better. A lot of time and work went into this game. A gem.

I Have Been Playing Dice Games My Whole Adult Life,Just Turned 42.I Have Also Hit The Arcades,And Played Console Games For Decadesüí™I Never Thought I Would Ever Become Addicted To A 2D RPG Ever Again!! This Game Is Old School AwesomeüëçüëçMy Life Is Chaos And No Longer Have Time To Sit At Home In My Gamer ThroneüòûBeen Craving A Mobile RPG For Years!! As For RPGs I'm A Very Picky Guyü§îI Love This Game,Hours Can Fly By If Your Not Carefulüòé Nice Controller Support As Wellüòä Huge Deep Game!üëçüëçüëçüëç
Pls add magic like cure Poison, Bleed and Disease cause i kinda so hard to get these potion if i'm too far from Town/Village.
Great game hours of fun
Unbelievable amount of great content. Endlessly replayable. Controller compatible. Amazing work.

The dev puts his heart into this series. I own all 3, and I must say the first was a great idea but riddled with bugs, still loved it. Second was improved upon but had annoying platforms. This 3rd one takes the best from previous, and has been definitely better. The game though is very unbalanced with magic, crafting, taming that it almost feels rushed out. Maby in a few months to a year this game could be balanced better. Updates have been adding in new game modes, and bug fixes.
Brill Game. Hours of fun. Like diabalo and skyrim ... but 2D. A regulary expanding world with multiple game dynamics. Beautiful runs really well on s20.
Game is pretty amazing armor needs some explaining and the companion need a few tweaks with spell usage but other than that its perfect.
Love this game so far
Awesome, just like its previous titels, its improved in every conceivable way, good job dev.

I own 9th Dawn 2. Half way through it. Now I have this game. The things that need attention, enemies see and try to attack you through walls. The staves seem op when other classes are cool too. Maybe a cool down bar for staves so you can't just spam it. Seriously lol. I want to be a warrior but it is easier to spam a stave and fireball combo. Thank you for changing melee combat. I love how enemies have attack animations. This way you can dodge hits and feel more in control of a warrior class.
Alot of fun! Tons to explore and a bit more forgiving than the last 2. Great game!

Oh please oh please listen to my story! I found this game a week ago. Tried the demo and fell in love! It's quite pricey where I'm from. Today I finally have some extra money to purchase this masterpiece and to my surprise, it is on sale! Of all days that it would be on sale, it's the day I'm less broke. I am convinced that this game is calling my name. Thank you devs! You guys are so generous!
Laggy, and it's just too much for my phone. What's the recommended requirements?
Awesome RPG, way too easy. You become overpowered too quick. If I play through again I'll do hard difficulty
Yet another bad port with graphics too small to see on a large mobile (note 8). So sick of these.

Well polished large world with lots of stuff to do. Very playable and excellent value with no pay 2 win or advertising. What a game is meant to be. It earns a 6th star from me...Now a roguelike mode. INCREDIBLE!
Your games are always incredible. I've bought every single one. I love supporting your work. Keep it up.

I played for 7 hours to give it a shot. Boring dungeon crawler. They said npc dialogue was funny etc. I only found stupid puns and cliche quest related speech. Combat is boring to the bone. Art is subpar even for pixel type games. Classes are heavily unbalanced. Tried to go for mage and spec 18 levels worth of xp into it, but still WAY more effective with greatsword, with no points into it. Some low level areas are literally impossible as a lv 18 mage. SOOO much more but can't fit in review box.

Max lvl, all creatures caught, all dungeons 100% Review : Robust. Big map. Lot of dungeons. Pace increases a lot mid-game. You cease to need weapons, as the abilities are far better. You can capture all creatures (excluding wildlife and humans). You get a follower that is identical to you, send you can swap on the fly. Both can have 10 active pets. Follower spams spells, then casts the lowest cost spell available (varies depending on SCD). Build accordingly to avoid headache. No respec option

This is a phenomenal game. No IAPs that I've found yet after the purchase price, rewarding exploration, great music, NPCs have their own day and night cycles, RPG mechanics... I haven't seen this quality from a mobile game in YEARS. While the combat is a bit lackluster, it's gritty, engaging and has it's own janky charm that few other games pull off. This game is absolutely worth it the money. Great community engagement from the developer as well!
Refreshing and immersive nostalgia RPG.

I saw a message when i started this app as i usually do about how this game's future relies on our feedback and all that. I usually ignore these requests but this game is truly worth a 5 star rating. Keep up the good work

I've only had this game for a short while but it has definitely satisfied my appetite for a solid mobile rpg. Many other games fall into the pit of pay to win or freemium. Glad to see this one is different. Happily paid for this.
Pretty good If keybindings for chromebooks could be put in that would be optimal for many who use them
There's a card game in the game
This is absolutely amazing. I had the oppertunity to play the previous two and loved both. Im going to love collecting all cards. I LOVE YOU VALORWARE!

It's a fun game. You can tell a lot of work was put into it. I'm not too into the secondary character (nameless). The AI isn't great (please allow us to set AI to defensive, aggressive, passive, etc).

All of my save files were randomely deleted when I started the game up. Absolutely unbelievable. I dont care if its only one developer. Thats no justification to allow for such a bug. Thats about as gamebreaking as it gets.
Would love to see some more updates to this game. Maybe more quests or a new area to explore.
Awesome game Tom.... Well done
I can't start game app won't start I try uninstall install restart tablet nothing can't lunch game help

Very nice step forward from the second installment. I reccomend this if you take a liking to games such as Diablo 1 & 2, the Baulders Gate series and the Elder Scrolls games. This is like a hybrid of some of the best arpgs with a new retro art style.

Very fun to start with, but the companion is just about totally useless on android for anything but an extra set of pets. If you want to craft weapons and armor you have to spend hours standing at a wall swinging your pick once you unlock it. While the companion stands there watching.
this game is a lot of fun and very well designed it is worth the money
Fun little rpg with tons of stuff to do. Cook, brew potions, train monsters, raid dungeons... the list goes on.
Another great game from the serie. Thanks Valorware.

I own this on android and xbox and absolutely love it! Just a fantastic game with and endless amount of build variety. So many different enemy types weapons armor and enchantments. Bravo for improving upon the last two 9th dawn games. Must buy game for any rpg fan.
Fantastically Deep and rewarding game. Makes you feel like you are playing Skyrim. Also, I hear a Rougelike mode is coming in the next update. THIS GAME IS WORTH THE PRICE OF ADMISSION!!!

Probably the best mobile RPG I've played. And I'm not even far into it yet. I can already see the incredible amount of playability and customization available to not only your characters, but your companion characters, and even pet party system. The abilities(skills/spells) being tied behind exploration markers and not levels is also somewhat interesting.
60+ h4s and still having a great time playing it.
Beautiful mobile classic RPG gameplay. Fun grind. Worth every penny. Great job to the developer, he's killing it.
Final not a pay to win game a fair good game. I love the openwork feel and progression.
Wow.
Probably one of the best games I ever played on Mobile
Brilliant game, enjoying every second of it!
This is a really good game, plenty of things to kill and a ton of loot to find.
This game is a blessing in my life!
Dotn connect on Google play games. Refund.

So far it is a solid game. I tend to choose speed classes like rouges and rangers so it annoys me that you can't move while attacking. It makes your speed only good while you are running away. That works with a bow, but not so well with daggers.
Love this series and this one is an instant classic
Plz make bringing the map up disabled during combat and while other menus are up
Arguably the best Android game I've played. Easily the best RPG. I'm about 50 hours in and still have a bit to go. Highly recommend.
Nice game. Weeeell done classic feel.

This game was exactly what I had been searching. I love isometric dungeon crawler games such as Diablo, but I always wished it concentrated more on exploring and story like Skyrim. This game happens to blend both of these genres together seamlessly. I have just started playing but I love what I have been seeing so far. The combat system is pretty simple not visceral like Diablo but I can live with that, since Skyrim really never had a great combat system anyway and that's one of my favorite games of all time! This game gives you a huge map to explore which just makes me drool :D! I just got done going through the Serpent Pit and 100% it. I highly recommend playing this game with headphones; it is actually pretty immersive with the well-done audio and music. I animations of the character is okay, but I wish he wasn't leaning so much when he's running. It makes it look weird like he's about to fall over. Also, I played this game on the PC as well, and I wish they had an option for click to move/attack like Diablo. I am enjoying this game so much right now and can't wait to continue exploring it. I haven't even captured any pets yet either! All this content and only a single developer at the helm, which blows my mind! The most fun game I had played in years! Support this game, it deserves way more attention on mobile and PC! Keep up the great work, Valorware!!
Very well written and fun RPG that will keep you occupied for weeks!

Extremely worthwhile action rpg. Nothing quite like it, other than the prequels. Fantastic mix of exploration, grind, looting, crafting, questing, running away (or towards) hordes of enemies, and overall feeling superpowered, but facing a worthy challenge. This builds on what came before, and is clearly the best of the three.
Not a huge fan of the controls, but overall it's hours of good fun exploring the world.
A must buy very fun and challenging also better than what these other trash mobile games that are carbon copies time and time again. this game is a breath of fresh air!

Ok upon further playing i have found a list of bugs and glitches. Needless to say, due to the scale of this game its still impressive. Phone: doesn't recognize ps4 controller and refuses to allow you to add items to quick bar. Reseting the game will fix this. Ps4: upon completing the weapon Smith quest, he will give you the iron but no recipe, still haven't been able to fix this, so no weapon crafting for me. Ps4: creatures refuse to be revived, even when out, ps4 needs to be reset. Chr limit

Its has good mechanics and abilitys i got no complaints about it, it would be interesting to see a necromancer class or being able to select different races for your main character, something like the overlord anime üòÜ

It has a large world comparable in size to Elder Scrolls (Morrowind, at least). It's also very entertaining and controls are great. I just played for 3 days now, but for me it seems a game which I gladly start just several times a day and it still offers a very deep RPG experience. Great!

I haven't played more than a few hours but the game is definitely a dungeon crawling rpg at it's core. I'm enjoying the game and am eager to give the developers credit! I can see the love that went into this game. Well done! I look forward to many more hours of play!
A solid game.

This game is pretty awesome. I haven't got too far yet but been enjoying it. My only minor grip would be the hot bar getting accidentally pressed while attacking which can be avoided by place items further on the bar. Also, I wish you could switch the cooking and alchemy games to start on the right side of the screen as that is my dominant hand. Other than that, this is a great little action rpg with good depth and smooth controls. Highly recommend.

I love this game I really do, I'm 30 hours in and the one major gripe I have with this game is that you cannot attack and move at the same time, I have to stand still to attack while 30-40 enemies overpower me! Why can't I run and attack at the same time? The mobs can, hell the mobs can hit me with curses and magic spells through several walls which is annoying. Fix these issues and I will give it 5 stars.
Great!

Countless hours of exploration, coupled with tons of loot and humorous dialogue make this title a true RPG masterpiece. Looking forward to future updates. Added content or expansions are always a welcome addition to titles of this calibre. Great work, team. Well worth every single penny!!
This is awesome so far. I'm really looking forward to the new rogue like game mode update. I hope it comes to Android soon!
Bought to support devs and 5 stars for an awesome classic style rpg with so many mechanics.

Really enjoy the game. It really pulls me in. Unfortunately, I encountered an annoying bug. When I came back to the game after pushing it to background, the menu, mini map etc got shrunk. It only resolves after I exit the game and swipe it off the app tray. I use redmi note 9 pro Edit: Problem is now resolved. My problem now is that I can't put this game down üòÇ Still waiting if developer will add a method to efficiently give item to companion though.
This game is clearly a labour of love. One of the best action rpg experiences on android
What a great game. Awesome job, developers!
Might be ok. I just didn't like the look and feel. Too fast and mobile-ish.

Great open world action rpg with taming/fishing and crafting. Lots of sub and main quest . Over 30hrs playing still doing dungeon and questing, pet taming and leveling something to do early, if not your two characters going be op and your pet wont last in harder dungen 50+ pally build and mage, hoping to find third person to build a bow/dagger rogue or ranger. Have all your games, best thing to do is just keep adding content , updating. You can really fairly do DLC paid one and free . Peace.

The game is amazing and fun but it becomes a mute point when you randomly get a bunch of high level monsters that spawn kill you at early level. Idk why this is going on but it made two runs absolutely unplayable.

The game is fun and challenging, the kind of rpg game that I imagine playing. If possible, making our own house would really be great since it has a massive map making a house in game would be possible if there's an option. I also think that fighting shouldn't make us immobile, I know we can move really slow when attacking but maybe you can improve it by completely enabling us to move while attacking. Lastly, if possible, please add co-op.

Great game, love that I was able to map my BT controller in the game menu (the mapping was off initially). One thing though, please optimize for Samsung DeX, right now it does go fullscreen but the minimap and health/mana bars are not extended all the way out to the corners and kinda overlap the play area a bit. It's still playable of course but Samsung DeX optimization would make it perfect. Just install on any current Samsung phone and plug in to a USB-C to HDMI adapter to see what I mean
One of the best games available on android in my opinion

Amazing! Best game of the series, absolutely love it. Like a 2D version of the best parts of Ultima, Diablo and Skyrim, sooooo much exploring! Skills are very well set out, leveling up is handled well. Game play is awesome, very immersive, great music too.

Awesome, legit action RPG that plays to the strengths of the mobile platform. The writing is funny and consistently intriguing, keeping me constantly on the look out for NPCs to chat with to see what they have to say and do. Didn't play the previous games but this one is a great game that doesn't feel like it left anything out. Keep up the great work devs. Your running animation is hilariously endearing. üèÉüèÉüèÉ
Excellent and fun. Try the demo and see if you like it first. I picked up the full version of the game immediately.
This game is awesome! Solo-developer? Totally blown away
Fun stuff yo

Incredible game. It's unbelievable to me that one developer was able to create such a masterpiece. I love that it's simple to control, yet has a lot of depth, many systems, tons of skills, and even a built in card game. Easily the most amazing mobile game I've ever played.
Very good RPG for mobile.
when i want to see a level that require to open a recepe that not opened for me a big list poopen up and dosn't late me to see it please fix theseüò≠

A great example of a flawed game that you should still absolutely try. Fyued is entertaining, the art style is retro-ish and becomes charming, and everything is set for a happily ever after...except that having EVERY enemy respawn any time you take the stairs makes exploring feel like a real grind, fighting the same enemies over and over again, in the same configurations, etc. It's an odd problem to have, and maybe it gets better on hard, but still worth a shot!
OMG !!!! I wasn't sure at first because of the price but .... Very promising (played 1h) , nice graphics, seems to have a lot to do, ... (Will update review as i play) Good job guys !!!
Easy controls, fun graphics, lots of puzzles, cool character building. Yes this games awesome

With 45 hours on the books now, I can safely say this is one of my favorite games on the play store. There is a good storyline, some funny characters, and a ton of items and equipment. The crafting system is the only negative I can think of, as it takes a rediculous amount of time and materials to complete some things, and the drop rates on the higher end materials is abysmal. Overall I highly recommend this game to anyone who like dungeon crawler rpgs.

Some mechanics are hard to learn(the game is kinda light on the explanation of them) but the game is so vast and so much fun it certainly deserves the 5 star once you begin to learn how it all fits together. I saw other reviews comparing it to skyrim and I agree, the skill advancement and scope does feel like that(i love skyrim)
great game! just 1 thing: could you please add more options to the controller? e.g. a possibility to make it fixed, not floating like now

Really great game, it's a bit funky in the beginning but once you get used to the controls it's great. Reminds me a lot like Dungeon Siege. Your character can be and use anything if you spend the time to upgrade that skill.

You can sell the bandages early game for quick cash. Once you are taught smithing, you will quickly be rich enough for expensive ingredients. High INT + Regen and a powerful spell = easy mode ^_^ (p.s. Use a loot chest to exchange items with your companion, they are common enough until we get a better option. ;)
This is by far and I mean by far the best genuine Offline game android has. The depth is unreal. I hope he keeps this going.

I appreciate the solo dev's work, but the game suffers from poor mechanics and execution. Early on, skills require lots of cash &/or items to slowly level with no results to show for. Adding to this, all crafting uses the same brainless tap minigame(which eventually becomes unnecessary at higher skill). All of this padding out the gameplay as you spend literal hours grinding out skills. The taming system the game touts about is absolutely garbage and is as fun as pulling out teeth. 25hr playtime

9th Dawn I & II are among my favorite mobile games by far. I am amazed to say the least with this game, it is worth every penny. The new sprite animations and crafting is wicked but still has the same feel as the previous games. No ads no wifi, I really don't see how it could get any better...how is this not the #1 paid game on the play store? Your guess is as good as mine! A big thank you to the dev for achieving something that is rarely done with mobile games!

Controls a little bit off and sucks especially on android touch. Maybe add some Dpad in both attack skills and movement. Overall its good just the controls sometimes off and didnt do what player intended to do on some particular scenario pike rolling and running away, sometimes the character still attacking if you want to run away, I hope consider adding more option on controlls not only swipe movement.

Absolutely the best mobile RPG. Updates are frequent and great. Love all the detail and comtent. Dev is super passionate and listens. Best game I have played in ages. :) I bought it on Mobile AND PC haha!
Great game
What an amazing game, great gamepad support!

Games great so far, lots of places to explore, quests to come across and villagers to talk to.. im about 2 hours in and havent unlocked everything yet but cant wait to tame some monsters. The card game is fun and reminds me of the one from ffix. The only thing I don't like so far is the time system. Stores won't be open at night and on certain days. Annoying if you need something

I'm deducting one star just because one thing : Cloud save. I already saving my account in my google play games and already checked it many times, my account was lv38 and after i change my devices and login with same email, my character still lv25. And i tried to clear data from apps, and login again on apps but my save game was lost, it is said like this "no saved game found". But in my old phones, the save game was still there. And i tried many times to save again, but the result still same.

Game is greatly improved over the last two.....can definately tell alot more work went into it.....animations are a nice touch My only gripe is the coin system to learn things You added all these new abilties, crafting and pet talents only to have it hamstringed by never having enough damn coins......feels like a future gatcha tactic your probably gonna implement later
There is so much to do in this game and I am really enjoying the challenge. This is definitely worth every penny.

Has it all, stats, perks/abilities, weapon specific skills that grow when used, more gear slots and types than you can imagine, crafting, taming, even a card game similar to Triple Triad in Final Fantasy. One minor annoyance to mention is the movement accuracy when using the floating move button, but to fix that there's a builtin controller support (which I haven't yet tried) but all in all this game has grown from 9th Dawn 1 and 2 which were great games already.
Best mobile game I've ever played. Excellently executed!

I have purchased the prior 2 versions and loved them both. I have put in about 5 hours into this one and so far it is the best one. I can tell that their was alot of time and imagination put into this game. Hope there will be a 4 in the future.
Exatcly what i was hoping it would be! Great job!
The game was made by one person and it's incredible how well made it is! The Dev have all my support for future games, keep up the good work!
The best game I ever played on android, really huge and massive old school rpg!

First off i'm gonna say that almost every single creature in the game can be caught and added to your team, it's awesome! I have never played a game that is so close to skyrim on andriod you buy it that's the only time you have to spend money, there is no ads, no in app purchases, and there is so much to do, with a huge map! I absolutely love this game.

Waited 4yr+. Little did I know how much of a beast this open world RPG this was gonna be! It's released on like 4 platforms!!! Open world!? Are you F-#$%)!$ kidding me?! I still can't wrap my head around the amount of content! This game is a completionist dream. If it has not already, expect this game to get some solid recognition and be featured on a grip of reputable news sites. Props Valor Knight. Congrats on its release. I wish you further success and..k it's done downloading. Peace.

I am usually a snob about 2d games on my phone. I want console-ish quality. This game changed my mind. I love it! It is one of those games that I think about at work and can't wait for down time. Tons to do. The graphics may look retro but this game is a breath of fresh air. Hats off to the devs.
Why main character and companion don't share the same inventory & bank storage??

I waited a while to write this because I wanted to get to know the game better now that I do: *The AI for the companion/s is bit wonky. They never stop running when you're standing still and will sometimes stand by while you get attacked/start attacking. *Skills like cooking, smelting, and mining in particular are somewhat hard to progress because it isn't very clear where to go to mine ore, or where to find a cooking fire. Still an amazing game 10 out of 5 *****

Incredible There is SO MUCH CONTENT. And so many different systems for crafting, cooking, fishing, alchemy, creature capture, weapon smithing, armor crafting. There is a ton of stuff here with a classless system that lets you play the way you want.

This game is a like a 2d Skyrim and it works great on mobile. If you are uncertain about the investment download the free demo and play. If you like the game you can use google cloud save and keep your character when you buy the full version. I wish the game had more detail on stats like if i'm what to be a dex based character how does heavy armor vs agile armor impact my effectiveness. But even without that type of detail there is so much fun to be had from crafting and creature capture/training to fun dungeons to crawl through. Plus you get companion charters that you can take control of and play just like your starter character. So basically you can have full control over a full party the fights together.
The only problem i have it's the fact that when i do something else and go back to the game. The ui would minimize which means i have to restart the game. Is kinda annoying
Love this game!
A dairy would be nice to help remember quests in hand, just a bit to much fighting, gets monotonous after a while, when returning to areas. Otherwise great! Just in time for a winter lockdown.

WORTH IT! Fantastic! The breadth & scope of this game, by which I mean the magnitude, right off the the bat..... It's overwhelming, & I'm head-over-heals IN LOVE! Gameplay is ridiculously simple, & the character development is complex, but oh-so easy to understand. I'm still in awe of the sheer size of the world y'all have created. I am in awe! & I've barely gotten started! Thank you so much! CHEERS! to y'all for making this (already!) The best mobile game I've ever bought!
one of the few open world rpgs on android. a solid release.
Great game
Bug where main guy is dead and companion dies and the screen just sits there. Cant get out of the game aside for force close. Not going to start all the way from the beginning.
replyContent: Hi, can you load your game and go to settings and enter the command "swiftwing" and hopefully it will take you out of there. Sorry about this, it's a very rare bug. If this doesn't work it may be the wrong version of the game, please email valorwareuk@gmail.com for further assistance, we can fix it. If it works please consider changing your rating.

content: I have put hundreds of hours in the two previous games. Seeing this release, I purchased immediately. Not even a minute into the game and I knew it was a masterpiece. Thanka for not giving up on this series Valorware. Hands down the best mobile rpg out there.
Finally. I'm lost for words, i've wanted full in depth games on mobiles for years. This is one.

This may be the best rpg I have ever played! I played slot of RPGs in the 90's on the snes and this took me straight back there! There is so much to do it's insane! Amazing combat, dungeon design, crafting and progression. The nameless is superb and the pet system is even better. I'll b playing this game for years! Thank u Tom!!!

Hardest part of this game is finding NPC to return quest to. You get to a point where several towns aren't complete and you need to turn a quest in. You have to run around multiple towns because you can't really remember where the quest was received. That's annoying. Return item to John. Where is John? Let me fast travel to 4 towns and run around to find John. Also, there is day and night in this game. Seems pointless. Annoying to run and sleep to spawn the NPC to sell items. Fun game tho.
Pocket skyrim in my hands‚ù£
It's a blessing these days to have a fully realised and polished rpg on the phone that doesn't play like garbage. This game is it! It's brilliant. Get it . @developer, keep making more .

Worth every penny, I'm glad i bought it. There's a game inside the game itself. I like playing flueyd in the game or whatever it was called. I thought that the dev has abandoned this series. 'Cause i don't know how many years they didn't update the last one. Turned out i was wrong. I'm glad i was about to play 9th dawn II again, and found this gem. Thank you for your hard work valorware.

This is now my favorite mobile game that I have ever played. A deep and immersive open world RPG like the ones I loved as a kid in the 90s. The retro graphics are charming and effective. Hours of things to explore including villages, dungeons, caves, hunting, fishing, a great card game to play against the npcs, etc etc etc. I love this game and I can't express it enough.
The best 9th Dawn yet, and I loved them all.
Awesome loop good for when you stuck in your shell on Evt
It's a good rpg, but if your worried about the cost try the demo.

Great game except bugs. Im stuck in a non existant wall and it freezes when do anything while there. Need a command list so can reset position or reboot the character. Really dont want to restart. Also 1 star for no support or help fixing the problem. When can play again will be happy to raise stars. Edit. Raised to 5 stars. I sent a email listed here in developer contac when scroll down which is different then the email you said to message. Which explains the lack of reply. May make them same.
replyContent: Hi, leaving bad reviews is not the best way to get support as I might not see it at all. Email me if you have problems. There IS a fix for this but depends on your version and my reply here is limited to 350 characters. EMAIL ME for support, we CAN fix this, negative reviews is not the way - valorwareuk@gmail.com

content: Yes. This is a great game, focused on the gameplay experience and not on flashy graphics. Nicely done. Reminiscent of various elder scrolls titles, but on your phone. What more do you want?
This is one of my favorite games... So much fun..
(frozen) on my Samsung Note 9 -- Android System. Downloaded on phone and would not load pass the character creation screen. Will digital download on Playstation 4 console as soon as I get back.

This game is awesome love it 5 stars reminds me of pixel skyrim i think you guys should turn this into a mmo honestly i would buy it and pay for a monthly sub for content think the game is designed well and is hard as hell in some points lots of loot lots of enemies lots of content great job guys! Was worth the price

Best game out there! The difficulty and leveling are great. You don't even know your grinding because the dungeons are so well developed. I really like the way you have time to search because the enemies do not respawn untill you use a stairway or ladder, and there are plenty of levers and chests to search out. Bottom line .... Please make more and don't change a thing!!!!

I've been playing this game for about 10-15 hours now (about 30 if you count my PC time) and I cannot stress how fun this game is. A brilliantly unique RPG experience, a massive leap up from the first two in the series and clearly a ridiculous amount of content! I really hope the Devs keep supporting this game and think about potential future expansions! Thanks Valorware!
This series keeps getting better.

Really enjoying this! Works well for both long and short sessions. Lots of things to do and ways to approach the game. Couple bugs with the UI from time to time, but I haven't lost much time from them given how often it saves.
Awesome game, see it as a Skyrim in 2D. Plenty of hours, I've already got over 25 hours so far. Far from being done with it :)
Wow. This game is really awesome. Devs really listen and update the game to further enhance the gaming experience.
Such an addictive game. Massive in size. Just needs a bit of work on the map and maybe an easier way to create items and use magic.
Really good game for such a price, even better. And i want to report some bug, the catalyst for cooking isnt working.

This game is AMAZING for a mobile game. I have logged 20 hours already and only level 50. There is so much we can do. The combat mechanics are fluid and everything else is just great! If you enjoy diablo type arpgs this will NOT dissapoint. 5 *s from me. Personal thought: A game exactly like this 2D but multiplayer would be a dream come true. With trading and set items and legendary or unique etc. With endgame dungeons and bosses to farm. I would happily spend 20$ for a game like that.

One of if not the Best ARPG's I've played on Mobile Bare None. I hope the developer makes expansions in the Future because if they do I will throw you my Hard Earned money!!! Lol Ive already 7 hours deep and I know i probably haven't even touched it... the vastness of the game. Thank you Thank you Thank you!!! üôèüèΩüôèüèΩüôèüèΩüôèüèΩüôèüèΩ

9th Dawn III, is an RPG experience for anyone, experienced or new, the storytelling is beyond anything I've played through and very well done. I enjoy the old-school style graphics. The gameplay is challenging, yet fun.

The fact that I autistically xenocided rats in the starting dungeon for five hours straight just to get their tails to level up cooking for a recipe would justify the price. After that, knowing that there is a lot more that I haven't even touched on gives this game an automatic 10/10. I've played the other installments, and the dev really went all-out on this game. I hope this game stays in the top 10 for a long time.
Absolutely stunning. Did not know it was on other platforms, but totally content with mobile version. Everything I wanted in a phone RPG and MORE. Seriously. Worth the money.

I Like All Y' All 9th Dawn Games Keep It Up But Your Card Game For 9th Dawn 3 Is Kind Of Confusing You Got Any Tips Cuz Some Folks Ain't Good At Math.üòû‚úå You should bring back the magnifying glass to zoom onto area map and you should add more slots like the ones from 9th Dawn 2 they were just right.

A truly fantastic RPG that really, really rewards you for exploring the huge world. To the dev. I couldn't find any bug report option in the game but it looks like party size is bugged. Allowing me to go above 10. Hope you see this cheers.
Please add zoom in and out on world map please after ill change my rating.
When phone goes to sleep if game is running, upon unlocking the hud is smaller than the game screen
Love all 3 - 9th Dawn games - best one yet

This is one of those games you'll sink hours upon hours of gameplay into. Really well done. It's also challenging and you'll probably die a lot but I mean the game restarts so fast it's no big deal, big props for that lol, I cant stand it when a difficult game takes forever to start back up again.
If Diablo and Runescape had to adopt a baby for whatever reason, this would be the baby they'd choose. Great game guys!

I've played for about 30 hrs now ,When it comes to Phone RPGs i have played many many different titles. 9th Dawn 3 comes the closest to what I'm looking for! The graphics are retro, it can get a bit grindy when you are doing trade skills, and the combat is swarm ish action. Getting used to the control take a little.. but it comes in time. It has active save states and auto saves every 10 min is very helpful. Pros - NO IAP, NO ADS, NO TIME LOCK PROGRESSION - Solid Open world RPS with basically all you can ask for - Good controls for mobile ( twin stick style ) - Does a good job at tacking your quests - Has a Decent map - Large enough to not feel congested, but not too large to feel overwhelmed. -Individual skills go up based on use ( axe, sword, fishing ect. ) - Achievements ! Neutral - When you leave the map and come back all the monsters are back. I dont mind this on the over world.. but due to the amount of mobs they throw at you in dungeons it can be annoying. - The Trade skills seem a bit low % wise. ( you need 15 Fried Rat Tail, but the drop rate on the tails is 10% and making the dish is 15% when you start ) you can see how this may be a grind. - The skill use progression is good and bad imo.. good because the obv. Bad because if you find a really good axe 20 hours in and have only used swords... you have no skill for it and need to grind. Cons - It can seem a bit Grindy for some quests/skills - There are many many weapons.. but they all kinda do the same thing.. with different stats ( sword vs axe ) so yes there are alot of weapons.. but like in most games to claim ALOT of weapons ( im looking at you Borderlands 3 ) but only maybe 20 ( and even less being viable ) - The Dungeons are a bit cluttered and hard to navigate. Many many levers and gates all over. Can seem a bit like a maze, there is a Map which is very helpful but it doesn't show any stairs, chests, ability orbs. - This moves into the ability orbs.. they are a MUST to advance abilities.. however you have to 100% dungeons to ensure you get them all. This can be very daunting given that each time you go up or down a floor all the monsters are back.. and healing is hard to come by at the very start. OVERALL I'm giving this title 5 starts not because its perfect, but because compared to your other options this is the best you will find on mobile IMO. NO IAP , NO ADS , NO TIME LOCK RESTRICTIONS. its refreshing to see in this era of mobile cash grab games. Also this got 8.9/10 on Chon Mobile Gaming Monthly This is the highest a Mobile RPG has scored so hats off for that!!
Awesome! Gotta support this fantastic developer. Would love multiplayer on phone. Pretty please

As close to a perfect mobile game as you could possible hope for. I initially bought this game on PC but after 10+ hours I decided to try it on mobile so I could play it during my down time at work and when commuting. It was a no brainer. The controls are perfect, the sound is great, the graphics are clear but simple and more than adequate and the game has so much depth you could easily sink hundreds of hours into it. And there isn't a single advert or microtransaction in sight. 10/10
If you like doing quests that involve farming low drop rate items from wildlife then processing them in a low success rate crafting mechanism, this game is for you!
Been a fan since the 1st. Worth the price. If ur an oldschool rpg guy like me this is a must have.

I absolutely love this game! I wasn't sure at first because of the weird way the character moves but I love the gameplay! There's a loooot to do. The crafting is great as well! It's not automatic so you need to be careful when you craft. The only thing I wish was in this game, is the ability to properly trade items with your companions. Be it from sharing inventory or storage. I love that this game is also on console as well!
Love everything about this game! This developer is so awesome. Everyone should try this game!

This game is a stepping stone of epic proportions, that started with 9th Dawn! Then came 9th Dawn II which I had a blast playing, minus jumping on the moving platforms. That didn't take away wanting to play the game though, especially if your looking for a great adventure. Now this mega monster spectacular ,they say the best things come in threes and there's now doubt! Congratulations Valorware keep it up! If your reading all these positive reviews download the free ver or just buy now!
A great classic ARPG
Phenomenal game, this is a rare and great rpg in a saturated market. You will love this game if you give it a try.
Excellent. Adding dungeon mini map and removing jumping are real QoL improvements over 9th Dawn II.
By far one of my favorite games on my phone. Easy controls and unlimited content.

By far the best 9th dawn game. The price tag put me off a little but once I finished the demo I was happy to give my $ to the developer. We ALL need to reward developers who take their time and make awesome products. Pick it up you won't be sorry. The only con I can think of is the on screen controls, moving around can get irritating. That con is such a small issue and should not keep anyone from getting this game.

Excellent. Epic. Superb. Brilliant. Masterful. Just a few words to sum it up. But yet it dont. Theres no words to describe how good this game is. From graphics to music. To tons of content. Play as you want. Do what you want. So if your reading this. Buy it. I almost over passed it . Then something told me. Hey theres a gem diamond in the raw. I was not disappointed. My only complaint on xbox. Is a zoom option on the map screen would be awsome. Thx for making a great game.

I was loving this game then opened my save this morning and the game world is just a pitch black void. The graphics have simply vanished. I was last playing as nameless and when o try to switch to the player character he doesnt appear.
Fun game. Can't wait to explore more of this world.

Great game. Odd issue though if I leave the game and go back to it and the UI is all shrunk down in the centre of the screen (buttons, map, etc) everything else is fine, have to close it completely then start it again.
All around excellent. This is the way games should be. Clear dedication and hard work put in, and charging a more than fair price for that work. Always happy to support Valorware.

Placeholder review based on excellent previous games. I have not had the chance to play it since I'm kinda busy and waiting till the noticeable bugs are fixed. Will update the review once I actually manage to play the game.
Doesn't open on Note 20 Ultra, just crashes. Please can this be fixed? :(
Exceptional on switch and android make both 1st and 2nd for switch

Absolutely love the game so far, great improvement from the first two games, which were good, too. Better UI, lots of QoL improvements, etc. Massive open world and lots to do. Definitely worth the money. I've found 2 little problems, tho: 1. I've had a few items in dungeons go invisible, but they reappeared when I reloaded the map. 2. The dodge button is too close to the change character button. I keep accidentally changing to my companion in the middle of a fight.
Great open world RPG. Loads of enemies, loads of loot, loads of fun.

Honestly i test it on cracked version first to see if it worth for my money. Play for 3 mins and i think this game is EPIC. Uninstall it and get origonal version to support dev. Great job and effort to make such handy and enjoyable game, 4.9 is insane ratting and yess.. This is it

I'm new to this game. I bought it at work tried it for a few minutes on break then did a refund. The visuals was odd I'm new to it. So, after work I said to myself let me check out reviews on YouTube and game site I like about the game. It had awesome good reviews From trusted sites I like to learn about new games from. I bought it again. I knew I couldn't get a refund. The developers done a great job! It's like skyrim. Glad to get it again really worth the money 100 times over.

Kept what was good from the previous installments, then improved everything else. A perfect sequel. So much is great, so I'll give only a few highlights: - Ambience has always been stellar in this series, this game being no exception - The world is detailed. Exploration and experimentation is a treat. - Class cookie-cutter: gone. Entirely based on how you play.
After the latest update, the game always force close.....please fix it.. A very quick response from the dev (especially, Tom) thanks...
replyContent: Thanks, Very sorry about this crashing issue. It is happening to everyone. I'm looking into it right now and a fix will be here very soon! I'm so sorry Tom

content: Hear me out, I will change my stars after this gets fixed because I love everything else about this game. There needs to be a 2 - 3 second click-hold delay when moving skills/items around on the skill bar OR skills/items cannot be moved when menus aren't open. So often im just trying to click a skill and it either moves it or completely drags it off of the skill bar with a single <.5 second touch. Way too sensitive for tapping skills üò™ Also, the menu should NOT close when you get hit!
replyContent: Hi! I hear you - This will be addressed soon, currently fixing some other sutff. I understand it is a problem! Thanks so much for the feedback!

content: I had a good time on the first day, however the second day I tried to open it and the game would consistently crash
replyContent: Hi, this has been fixed yesterday, please update the game. Sorry about this, if you enjoy it please consider adjusting your review, thanks!

content: Have followed this Dev since the beginning of the trilogy, and every time theyve brought us a wonderful experience. Ive waited for this since it was first announced, and am blown away by the end result. This is a dev that cares for their fans, is very active within the community, and is worth supporting. I highly encourage anyone on the fence to play this game!

Every game by the dev is worth getting this is the best one so far though. The graphics aren't amazing but its fine. This game shines everywhere else though. Open world, questing, crafting, cooking, animal taming, and a neat card game that can be played with npcs throught the world. This is easily one of the best open world rpgs on android so far. The dev is also quick to update and listens to his fans!

This game is a gem. It's a lot of fun to play, and it's nice and long with plenty of contents. There are so many skills to choose and interesting quests to do. Albeit you have your usual kill this and fetch that but it's cleverly woven into the storylines. The only thing I think can be handled better is the pacing of it. Chest drop is static and it's not right in a opened world. It's ok to have one after a boss fight but random chests would be nice. Ui MUST HAVE A LOCK!

Great game. Bit stuck at the bandithouse, cant find how to open the last door below. Controls definitely can improve further. Hot spot better changeable when opening the bag. I kept on moving or accidentally delete from hotspot when facing many enemies.. Edit: ok sunddenly the valve showed up. I found that sometimes thing can disappear from screen. Like the valve or roadblock.
I know it's a great game,but mostly wanted to let you know now the game starts after fix,it didn't start last night on my Xiaomi note 10 lite,but know it's fine. Thank you

Wow, l didn't see that coming. The third instalment of this serie... This game is unique and I'm very gratefully that you chose to continue. This game need to be more popular. I see it is on the Nintendo Switch. Congratulation and thank you. Money well spent. :)
Game crashes on start on Samsung note avoid this for now, huge waste of money
replyContent: Hi! This has now been fixed, please update! I am so sorry this happened. If you enjoy the game please consider adjusting your review, thank you!

content: I'm back here again and I'm changing my review to something more positive. I take back what I said about the whole open-world issue and now fully understand the whole reason as to why the game limits your freedom. That's because the dev's want you to get stronger and that's only when you can explore the open-world fully with barely to no limits. I think the recent updates made the game better and I thank you dev's for that. Stick with the same difficulty though, I like it!

Can't add more characters to my other review... but I also cannot seem to catch monsters in this game. I don't know if it's due to a lack of instruction or its bugged. 10 medium bait on a wolf cub and only 1 heart starts appearing. Using 10 medium traps after doesnt catch.... how much gold do I need to waste on trying to get a monster/pet?
It's like diablo 2 and skyrim had a 2d love child, but paper Mario is in the family tree somewhere too...and on erry damn platform...5 stars indeed
Definitely worth the full price.
Damn, that's a fast fix

The game is a master piece I had all three 9th dawn games and I don't play mobile game at all. This beats any ptw rpg on the play store hands down And it basically built by one dev Game has almost no bugs graphics are spot on im running 9th dawn on a galaxy s20 note ultra and it runs flawlessly The asking price is more then fair for such a high quality game ( and I hope he will up the price in the near future) I'm not the kind of person who does reviews just play it
Outstanding game and developer! If you love RPG's then this game is a must buy.

Amazing title to have on my phone. Honestly reminds me of Runescape or a skyrim. Whether its 2d or not it has a ton of mechanics and the magic is so much fun. Definitely passes the time like crazy. I play this on my phone more than I play my console. The fact that this is a solo developer is unreal. Hats off üëè üôå

Amazing game, just like the previous two! A more minor issue is that I keep accidentally removing skills from the hotbar. I'm trying to tap it, but sometimes I'll move my finger a bit and the skill is moved off the bar. Since the game doesn't pause im when inventory is opened, I can't add the skill back without taking damage. Need to have a setting too lock the hotbar. Updated to 5* as the crashing issue was addressed right away, great dev!
replyContent: Hi! This has now been fixed, please update! I am so sorry this happened. If you enjoy the game please consider adjusting your review, thank you! The skills slipping off hotbar is an issue, I agree, this will be solved with an update coming soon! thank you

content: A truly amazing game, so much to do, to explore. I fully recommend it for anyone even mildly interested in RPGs.

Awesome game, I'm addicted! Skills are so aweosme and they all feel so different so far., an improved version of number 2 which is just amazing. It's funny I have all these AAA pc and console games but I'd rather come and play this üòÅ

content: Best rpg on android hands down
Great developer, fair price, no gouging. Lovely

My personal opinion this game is EPIC!!! This solo developer has put so much work and is still putting in work to correct bugs across multiple platforms at the same time,the discord is very active and it's been a blast,here is to many more great releases. Hail,Valorware. Some big name developers could learn a thing or two from this kind of dedication and passion.
Very fun, much content. My only complaint is how much money I have to spend on bait to catch the first creature like wooooow.

Great graphics (came a long way from previous two games), with surprising depth for a mobile action RPG (skill trees, mini game, etc.) okay control. I've kept trying these types of mobile RPG and 9tg Dawn 3 hands down is the best. Two gripes though. 1) Text is so small you better okay this on a larger phone or device. 2) Controls need to be optimized. Too easy to accidentally tap on Settings or Backpack. And the quick access bar needs to have a lock mechanism to avoid accidentally deletion.
Amazing game for mobile. No iap, no ads, just a ton of content. This game is worth every penny
Brilliant game, credits to YouTube channel Nookrium for showing me this game.
Best rpg on Android. Love it.

One of the best open world rpg game I've ever played. Big map, huge dungeon, a lot of things to collect. This is good.
Bought it for the RPG, stayed for the trading card game. Solid game. Well worth the price.
Real nice open world rpg.
Amazing! To all you other game devs out there... this is how you do it.

Amazing game. By far one of my favorite mobile games of all time. The graphics may be something that some people feel uneasy about but trust me, the gameplay, size and scale, and depth of the game make up for the look. I prefer this over games such as genshin impact and others. The developers have spent their time building a great game with so many options and size they focused on the gameplay and actual game. Honestly awesome, nice to have a game that I want to and enjoy playing all night.
A masterpiece
Played for a short time. Really enjoyable. Controller support is great.
Awesome üëç . Worth every cent .

I've played about 5 hours so far and I like it as much as I like the last two. I haven't left the first settlement yet. I am still playing the card game. I really like the card game. Do I sense a gwent-esque small spin off?

Fans of the previous two titles in the 9th Dawn saga will not be disappointed. Features that stood out in the original two have been tightened and improved. Graphics gave gotten cleaner in its charm. The biggest draw is gameplay. 9th Dawn 3 offers TONS for the RPG enthusiast. A Gwent-esque collectible card game (which can be played with EVERY NPC) won me over instantly, but the amount of content is staggering. In the world of mobile games, this is my Skyrim. Thanks for another quality entry!!!
Genshin who? 10/10 rpg with lots of depth
Perfection

content: One of the greatest games I've ever played and I've played a lot. I couldn't recommend this enough. Great game, great dev.

Cloud saves! I might finish just here but only after few minutes I can set many other improvements compared to previous games, like better animations, picking up items, better UI overall... So thank you, it was a really nice surprise when I saw it in the store (pre-register) just yesterday :-)
Dude there is so much to do! Been waiting for so long to finally play that I even download the 1st 2 games!

Very excited to finally be playing 9th Dawn 3! Features 22 character equipment slots, armor, rings, weapons, etc. most equipment has upgrade enhancement slots. Alchemy system, cooking and crafting. No jumping! World map looks huge. Town storage bank. Dungeons are vast and packed with loot, breakable barrels, crates, secrets, etc.
Even better than the first one and second one been looking forward to this a long time I'm glad to be playing. i purchased within minutes of it being released :)

Thank you for making this game. It's much better than 9th dawn II. I do wish the pet trap and bait prices were slashed to half for the small ones and make it easier to trap small ones since we all know we will eventually go for the bigger ones. The game is a little unbalanced regarding the butterfly enemies when rescuing the nameless one because it's peers are much weaker and it doesn't even drop good loot to begin with. All in all a thoroughly enjoyable experience. Worth every penny.
Great game... Huge map.. Tons of content
